Record.ClassificationPath: Digestive System Diseases/Biliary Tract Diseases/Bile Duct Diseases/Common Bile Duct Diseases/Biliary Dyskinesia
Record.Description: A motility disorder characterized by biliary COLIC, absence of GALLSTONES, and an abnormal GALLBLADDER ejection fraction. It is caused by gallbladder dyskinesia and/or SPHINCTER OF ODDI DYSFUNCTION.
